name: Pokéball
description: A device for capturing wild Pokémon.

name: Great Ball
description: A device with higher capture rate than a standard Pokéball.

name: Ultra Ball
description: A device with higher capture rate than a Great Ball.

name: Razz Berry
description: A berry that can be used to make a Pokéblock.

name: Pokéblock
description: An item to increase a Pokémon's happiness.

name: Fire Stone
description: An item used to evolve certain species of Pokémon.

name: Water Stone
description: An item used to evolve certain species of Pokémon.

name: Thunder Stone
description: An item used to evolve certain species of Pokémon.

name: Leaf Stone
description: An item used to evolve certain species of Pokémon.

name: Sun Stone
description: An item used to evolve certain species of Pokémon.

name: Moon Stone
description: An item used to evolve certain species of Pokémon.

name: Rare Candy
description: An item that is used to level up your Pokémon.

name: Master Ball
description: A device for capturing wild Pokémon without fail.
